title: CryptoDevzy
author: CryptoDevzy
content: Hello!I came across something really interesting, it's a fully decentralized Web 3.0 Marketplace called Pinky Finance. This could be useful for some new crypto projects or web 3 developers - to sell their products.www.pinky.finance/marketplace BTCHere are some more details that devs can check:In the ever-evolving landscape of blockchain technology, our commitment to innovation has led us to create a groundbreaking platform — the first fully decentralized Web 3 marketplace for crypto products.We’re thrilled to introduce a space where users can seamlessly connect their wallets, and purchase DApps, smart contracts, and more with cryptocurrency, all while enjoying unparalleled security and privacy.User-Centric ExperienceAt the heart of our decentralized marketplace is a commitment to user convenience and security. With just a few clicks, users can connect their wallets, browse a diverse range of crypto products, and make purchases without the need to provide any personal details.This not only streamlines the buying process but also enhances user privacy — a core tenet of our platform.Instant Access to ProductsGone are the days of waiting for manual verification and approval processes. Upon completing a purchase, users automatically receive the files they’ve acquired, ensuring a swift and frictionless experience.This instant access model represents a paradigm shift in how users interact with and obtain crypto products.Seamless Product Submission for DevelopersFor developers, our platform offers an uncomplicated product submission process. By filling out a straightforward submission form, developers can list their DApps, smart contracts, and other crypto products for sale on our marketplace.This simplicity is designed to encourage innovation and diversity within the crypto space.Currently supported Blockchains for Product listing: Binance Smart Chain & Ethereum Mainnet. (Price needs to be entered in BNB or ETH).List your product for sale: https://www.pinky.finance/marketplace/create

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: This leaves me with a question, is this the solution to the challenge of a non-existing all-encompassing web3 marketplace  in the blockchain space?We have loads of web3 products hitting the market everyday but just a little find their way to Decentralised markets owing to several reason which includes compatibility.
